short_description_localized.en: Studio Room with Two Queen Beds - 495 Sq Ft / 46 sqm -Marble Bath - 55 gal tub - custom toiletries - Boudoir Chairs
short_description_localized.fr: Chambre Studio avec 2 Lits Queen-Size - 46 m² - Baignoire en marbre - Baignoire 55 gallons - Articles de toilette personnalisés - Chaises Boudoir
short_description_localized.it: Camera monolocale con due letti Queen - 495 Mq / 46 mq - Vasca da bagno in marmo - Vasca da 55 galloni - Articoli da toeletta personalizzati - Sedie Boudoir

description_localized.en: Our Studio rooms offer genuine Italian luxury, with queen size beds, spacious entrance foyers and seating areas, and lavish marble bathrooms. Elegant neoclassical lines work with a soothing color palette and bold Empire-style cherry wood furniture. It’s a combination of style, space and comfort seldom found in New York boutique hotels. Studio Room are located on floor 3 - 7.
description_localized.fr: Nos studios offrent un luxe italien authentique avec des lits queen-size, un hall d'entrée spacieux et un coin salon, ainsi qu'une salle de bains en marbre somptueuse. Les lignes élégantes de style néoclassique se marient avec une palette de couleurs apaisante et un audacieux mobilier en cerisier de style Empire. C’est une combinaison de style, d’espace et de confort que l’on trouve rarement dans les hôtels-boutiques new-yorkais. Les studios sont situés aux étages 3 à 7.
description_localized.it: Le nostre camere Studio offrono autentico lusso italiano, con letti queen size, ampi foyer d'ingresso e posti a sedere e lussuosi bagni in marmo. Eleganti linee neoclassiche funzionano con una tavolozza di colori rilassanti e audaci mobili in legno di ciliegio in stile impero. È una combinazione di stile, spazio e comfort che raramente si trova nei boutique hotel di New York. Le camere Studio si trovano dal 3 al 7 piano.

images.name: Studio-Room-2-Queen-Beds-
images.alt: This photo showcases our 495 square foot room, featuring two Queen size bed against the side wall with one night stand between the two beds. Across from the beds there is a seating arrangement which consists of two armchairs and a small table. In addition there is an armoire with dresser drawers and a 43 inch flat screen TV. Next to the armoire you will find a fully stocked mini bar, including wine, bottled beverages and assorted snacks available for purchase. The room also features a full size work desk, an Italian marble bathroom with a 55 gallon soaking tub and a vanity.
